mapper.select: /*로그인ID로 소속 센터 조회*/ SELECT S1.WARE_NO AS WARE_NO FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ P1 INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON P1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID AND P1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM WHERE 1=1 AND P1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND P1.PRTNR_NO = (SELECT EPNO FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{session.loginId} ) AND P1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') AND S1.WARE_DV_CD = '2' AND S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20' AND S1.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT S1.WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , S1.WARE_NM /* 창고명 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE S1.APY_YM = #{baseYm} AND S1.WARE_DV_CD = '2' AND S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20' ORDER BY WARE_NO, WARE_NM

/*세부창고정보*/ SELECT S1.WARE_NO , S1.WARE_NM FROM WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역*/ ON O1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID AND S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD LIKE '2%' AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*서비스센터*/ AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') /*서비스센터조직 이하 개인 창고 사용 여부*/
AND (S1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} OR (S1.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND S1.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y'))
AND (S1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} OR (S1.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND S1.WARE_USE_YN = 'N'))
AND (S1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} OR S1.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo})
AND O1.CLO_DT IS NULL AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY S1.WARE_NO

WITH PART_INF AS ( /*품목정보*/ SELECT P1.PD_CD , TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(P2.SAP_MAT_CD)) AS SAP_MAT_CD /*SAP자재코드*/ , P2.PD_NM /*품목명*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL06 AS AS_LDTM /*리드타임, AS_LDTM*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL17 AS AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD /*자재관리유형, AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD, MAT_MNGT_DV_CD 1 기초1, 2 기초2, 3 기초3, 4 기초4, 5 기초5, 6 기초6, 7 기초7, 8 기초8*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL21 AS AS_MAT_CMN_CLSF_CD /*AS자재 공통분류, AS_MAT_CMN_CLSF_CD, CMN_PART_DV_CD*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL30 AS TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN /*회전율 대상여부, TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL07 AS MIN_GO_QTY /*최소발주량, MIN_GO_QTY*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL32 AS UI_EXPSR_YN /*사용여부*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL36 AS SV_MAT_GRP_CD /*서비스자재그룹 A 일반, B 설치, C 필터, D 피팅/폼, E 중수리, F 소모품, G 공구*/ , (CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IS NULL THEN SUBSTR(P1.PD_PRP_VAL01,2,1) ELSE P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 END) AS AS_MAT_ITM_GRP_CD /*PD_GRP_CD AS자재 품목그룹*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL26 AS AS_SPL_UNIT_AMT /*물류의 공급단가(물류 매각시 사용단가)*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 || P1.PD_PRP_VAL31 AS KIWI_PD_CD , P1.PD_PRP_VAL15 AS ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN /*기초자재 필터*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL21 AS CMN_PART_DV_CD /*중수리 필터*/ FROM WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P1 /*상품각사속성상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' /*상품유형코드 : C 복합상품, P 기준상품, S 서비스, M 교재제품, Y 융합상품*/ AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND P1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' /*품목종류 구분값이 있을 경우, 전체면 조건 제거*/
AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKndCd} /*AS자재 품목종류, AS_MAT_ITM_KND_CD, ITM_KND_CD*/
/*사용여부 Y, N 조건 값이 있을 경우, 전체면 조건 제거*/
AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL32 = #{useYn}
AND TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(P2.SAP_MAT_CD)) BETWEEN #{fromSapCd} AND #{toSapCd}
AND TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(P2.SAP_MAT_CD)) LIKE #{fromSapCd}||'%'
AND TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(P2.SAP_MAT_CD)) LIKE #{toSapCd}||'%'
AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , WARE_INF AS ( /*서비스 센터 및 창고*/ SELECT O1.BASE_YM , O1.OG_ID , O1.OG_TP_CD , O1.OG_CD , O1.OG_NM , O1.HGR_OG_ID , S1.WARE_NO , S1.WARE_NM , S1.WARE_USE_YN , S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD , S1.HGR_WARE_NO , S1.STD_WARE_USE_YN /*표준창고사용여부*/ FROM WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역*/ ON O1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID AND S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD LIKE '2%' /*서비스센터조직 이하 개인 창고 사용 여부*/
AND (S1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} OR (S1.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND S1.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y'))
AND (S1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} OR (S1.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND S1.WARE_USE_YN = 'N'))
AND (S1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} OR S1.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo})
AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') /*서비스센터*/ AND O1.CLO_DT IS NULL AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY S1.WARE_NO ) , BTD_STOC_QTY AS ( /*창고별 기초재고 + 재고실사입고 + 재고실사 출고*/ SELECT S1.WARE_NO , S1.ITM_PD_CD /*등급에 따라 재고 수량 계산*/ , (CASE WHEN 'A' = 'A' THEN S1.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY + S1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_A_GD_QTY - S1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_A_GD_QTY WHEN 'A' = 'B' THEN S1.BTD_STOC_B_GD_QTY + S1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_B_GD_QTY - S1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_B_GD_QTY WHEN 'A' = 'E' THEN S1.BTD_STOC_E_GD_QTY + S1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_E_GD_QTY - S1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_E_GD_QTY WHEN 'A' = 'R' THEN S1.BTD_STOC_R_GD_QTY + S1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_R_GD_QTY - S1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_R_GD_QTY ELSE 0 END) AS BTD_QTY /*전체 등급이라면*/ /*, S1.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY + S1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_A_GD_QTY - S1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_A_GD_QTY*/ /*+ S1.BTD_STOC_B_GD_QTY + S1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_B_GD_QTY - S1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_B_GD_QTY*/ /*+ S1.BTD_STOC_E_GD_QTY + S1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_E_GD_QTY - S1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_E_GD_QTY*/ /*+ S1.BTD_STOC_R_GD_QTY + S1.STOC_ACINSP_STR_R_GD_QTY - S1.STOC_ACINSP_OSTR_R_GD_QTY AS BTD_QTY*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WARE_TP_CD', S2.WARE_TP_CD, 'ko') || '-' || /* 창고 */ F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_ANGLE_CD', S2.ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL, 'ko') || '-' || /* 앵글 */ F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_COF_CD', S2.ITM_LCT_COF_VAL, 'ko') || '-' || /* 층수 */ F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_FLOR_NO_CD', S2.ITM_LCT_FLOR_NO_VAL, 'ko') || '-' || /* 층번호 */ F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_MAT_GRP_CD', S2.ITM_LCT_MAT_GRP_CD, 'ko') AS LCT_NM /* 그룹 */ FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ S1/*월별품목재고내역, ST122TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_INF W1 ON S1.BASE_YM = W1.BASE_YM AND S1.WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO INNER JOIN PART_INF P1 ON S1.ITM_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_LCT_IZ S2 /*고객서비스품목위치내역, ST110TB*/ ON S2.WARE_NO = (CASE WHEN W1.STD_WARE_USE_YN IS NOT NULL AND W1.STD_WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN '200012' /*대전서비스센터*/ ELSE #{wareNo} /*서비스센터조직 창고 선택 값*/ END) AND S1.ITM_PD_CD = S2.ITM_PD_CD AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND S1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , NOM_STR_QTY AS ( /*정상입고*/ SELECT S1.STR_WARE_NO , S1.ITM_PD_CD , S1.STR_QTY FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_ITM_STR_IZ S1 /*품목입고내역, ST141TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_INF W1 ON S1.STR_WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.STR_QTY > 0 /*조회기간입력조건*/ AND S1.STR_RGST_DT BETWEEN #{baseYm} || '01' AND #{stockDt} /*등급입력조건*/ AND S1.ITM_GD_CD = #{itmGdCd} AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , NOM_OSTR_QTY AS ( SELECT S1.OSTR_WARE_NO , S1.ITM_PD_CD , S1.OSTR_QTY FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ S1 /*품목출고내역, ST161TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_INF W1 ON S1.OSTR_WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.OSTR_QTY > 0 /*조회기간입력조건*/ AND S1.OSTR_DT BETWEEN #{baseYm} || '01' AND #{stockDt} /*등급입력조건*/ AND S1.ITM_GD_CD = #{itmGdCd} AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , RTNGD_STR_OTSD_GD_QTY AS ( /*외부반품입고(작업입고)*/ SELECT S1.WK_WARE_NO , S1.ITM_PD_CD , S1.USE_QTY FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ S1 /*서비스작업출고내역, ST163TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_INF W1 ON S1.WK_WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '6' AND S1.USE_QTY > 0 /*조회기간입력조건*/ AND S1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT BETWEEN #{baseYm} || '01' AND #{stockDt} /*등급입력조건*/ AND S1.FNL_ITM_GD_CD = #{itmGdCd} AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , RTNGD_OSTR_OTSD_GD_QTY AS ( /*외부반품입고(작업출고)*/ SELECT S1.WK_WARE_NO , S1.ITM_PD_CD , S1.USE_QTY FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ S1 /*서비스작업출고내역, ST163TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_INF W1 ON S1.WK_WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD != '6' AND S1.USE_QTY > 0 /*조회기간입력조건*/ AND FNL_VST_FSH_DT BETWEEN #{baseYm} || '01' AND #{stockDt} /*등급입력조건*/ AND S1.FNL_ITM_GD_CD = #{itmGdCd} AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , GD_CTR_STR_QTY AS ( /*등급조정수량입고*/ SELECT S1.WARE_NO , S1.PD_CD , S1.CTR_QTY FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_ITM_GD_CTR_IZ S1 /*품목등급조정내역, ST173TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_INF W1 ON S1.WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 /*조회기간입력조건*/ AND S1.STAT_CTR_APY_DT BETWEEN #{baseYm} || '01' AND #{stockDt} /*등급입력조건*/ AND S1.AFCT_ITM_GD_CD = #{itmGdCd} AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , GD_CTR_OSTR_QTY AS ( /*등급조정수량출고*/ SELECT S1.WARE_NO , S1.PD_CD , S1.CTR_QTY FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_ITM_GD_CTR_IZ S1 /*품목등급조정내역, ST173TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_INF W1 ON S1.WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 /*조회기간입력조건*/ AND S1.STAT_CTR_APY_DT BETWEEN #{baseYm} || '01' AND #{stockDt} /*등급입력조건*/ AND S1.BFCT_ITM_GD_CD = #{itmGdCd} AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , WARE_AGRG_QTY AS ( /*창고별 집계 수량*/ SELECT Q1.WARE_NO , Q1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(NVL(Q1.BTD_QTY,0)) + SUM(NVL(Q2.STR_QTY,0)) + SUM(NVL(Q4.USE_QTY,0)) + SUM(NVL(Q6.CTR_QTY,0)) - SUM(NVL(Q3.OSTR_QTY,0)) - SUM(NVL(Q5.USE_QTY,0)) - SUM(NVL(Q7.CTR_QTY,0)) AS AGRG_QTY , Q1.LCT_NM FROM BTD_STOC_QTY Q1 LEFT OUTER JOIN NOM_STR_QTY Q2 ON Q1.WARE_NO = Q2.STR_WARE_NO AND Q1.ITM_PD_CD = Q2.ITM_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN NOM_OSTR_QTY Q3 ON Q1.WARE_NO = Q3.OSTR_WARE_NO AND Q1.ITM_PD_CD = Q3.ITM_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN RTNGD_STR_OTSD_GD_QTY Q4 ON Q1.WARE_NO = Q4.WK_WARE_NO AND Q1.ITM_PD_CD = Q4.ITM_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN RTNGD_OSTR_OTSD_GD_QTY Q5 ON Q1.WARE_NO = Q5.WK_WARE_NO AND Q1.ITM_PD_CD = Q5.ITM_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN GD_CTR_STR_QTY Q6 ON Q1.WARE_NO = Q6.WARE_NO AND Q1.ITM_PD_CD = Q6.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN GD_CTR_OSTR_QTY Q7 ON Q1.WARE_NO = Q7.WARE_NO AND Q1.ITM_PD_CD = Q7.PD_CD GROUP BY Q1.WARE_NO, Q1.ITM_PD_CD, Q1.LCT_NM ) , BASE_GROUP AS ( SELECT AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD , TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(P1.SAP_MAT_CD)) AS SAP_MAT_CD , P1.KIWI_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM , Q1.LCT_NM , Q1.WARE_NO , NVL(Q1.AGRG_QTY,0) AS AGRG_QTY , P1.ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN /*기초자재 필터*/ , P1.CMN_PART_DV_CD /*중수리 필터*/ FROM PART_INF P1 LEFT OUTER JOIN WARE_AGRG_QTY Q1 ON P1.PD_CD = Q1.ITM_PD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND Q1.WARE_NO IS NOT NULL AND Q1.AGRG_QTY != 0 ORDER BY SAP_MAT_CD, PD_CD, WARE_NO ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SAP_MAT_CD , KIWI_PD_CD , PD_NM , LCT_NM , ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN /*기초자재 필터*/ , CMN_PART_DV_CD /*중수리 필터*/ , ${wareNoAgrgQtyFields} , ${wareNoAgrgQtySumFields} AS WARE_NO_AGRG_QTY_SUM_FIELDS FROM BASE_GROUP PIVOT(SUM(AGRG_QTY) AS AGRG_QTY FOR WARE_NO IN (${wareNoInStr})) T1 ) WHERE WARE_NO_AGRG_QTY_SUM_FIELDS != 0
